description: WARNING: The color of the cylinder in this image is RANDOM and IRRELEVANT. Match ONLY based on spatial position. This slot is strictly BOTTOM-RIGHT. CRITICAL DEFINITION: To be bottom_right, the object must satisfy TWO conditions: 1. It is clearly BELOW the central handle (lower half). 2. It is clearly to the RIGHT of the central handle. If it is on the horizontal midline, it is mid_right, NOT bottom_right.
